company_description: Zilch is a fintech company that offers a buy now, pay later service, allowing customers to spread the cost of their purchases over multiple installments without interest or fees.
founders: Philip Belamant, Sean O’Connor, Serge Belamant
embedding_text: Zilch is a fintech company that offers a buy now, pay later service, allowing customers to spread the cost of their purchases over multiple installments without interest or fees.
